mutants.original_line: words = [re.sub(r'\W+', '', word) for word in words]
mutants.mutated_line: words = [re.sub('', '', word) for word in words]
mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def word_count(string):
    words = string.split()
    words = [re.sub('', '', word) for word in words]
    words = [word for word in words if len(word) >= 4]
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    return word_counts
